US.name: United States
US.fact: In the US, Christmas stockings are hung by the fireplace for Santa to fill with gifts.

MX.name: Mexico
MX.fact: Mexicans celebrate Las Posadas, a reenactment of Mary and Joseph's search for shelter.

DE.name: Germany
DE.fact: Germany is famous for its Christmas markets and the tradition of the Advent calendar.

JP.name: Japan
JP.fact: In Japan, Christmas is celebrated with KFC and strawberry shortcake!

AU.name: Australia
AU.fact: Christmas in Australia is during summer, so many celebrate with a BBQ on the beach.
